definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="spawn_entity"><field name="entity">EntityTurtle</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="world_entity_inrange_exists"><field name="entity">EntityTurtle</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="range"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">4</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">MagicMod/Debug/BasicProjectileHitsBlock: Summoned Turtle Correctly.</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">MagicMod/Debug/BasicProjectileHitsBlock: Summoned Turtle Failed.</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
